address.addrLine: Department of Near and Middle Eastern Collections

msContents.summary: Manuscript with several works bearing the general title: Kullīyāt-i Jamālī كليات جمالی

msItem.title: Ghazals, with the takhalluṣ of Jamālī

handNote.persName: Sayyid ʿAlī Akbar al-Hiravī سيد علی اكبر الهروی

recordHist.source: "Manuscript description based on. R. A. Nicholson: A descriptive catalogue of the Oriental MSS belonging to the late E.G. Browne. Cambridge, 1932. ", abbreviated by the OCIMCO project team.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card for admissions procedures contact Cambridge University Library Admissions). Contact near_eastern@lib.cam.ac.uk for further information on the availability of this manuscript
